```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

# Set up packages and connect to RStudio Connect board
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(bikeHelpR)

rsc <- pins::board_rsconnect(auth = "envvar")
```

# Get data from API
```{r}
# Get list of feeds
feeds <- feeds_urls()

# Get station status Data and clean
dat <- feeds %>% 
  filter(name == "station_information") %>% 
  pull("url") %>%
  get_data() 
  extract2("data") %>%
  select(station_id, name, lat, lon) %>%
  unique()
```

# Pin
```{r}
pins::pin_write(
  board = rsc,
  x =  dat,
  name = "alex.gold/bike_station_info",
  type = "rds",
  title = "List of stations of Capitol Bikeshare", 
  )
```
